settings.editor:
I am a 4th year student studying in VIT Vellore, pursuing B.Tech in Information Technology.

I am an competitive programmer. I am skilled in Data Structures, C++, SQL . I am always eager to learn new and innovative things. Apart from this some of my other hobbies are Gaming and Singing!.

Currently Pursuing B.TECH in Information Technology from Vellore Institute of Technology , Vellore.

JULY 2018 - JUNE 2022
I have completed my Schooling i.e. both 10th and 12th from Cambridge School Srinivaspuri, New Delhi
Worked as a Front-End Web Developer Intern at FundingX
Worked as a C++ Developer Intern at CodeSpeedy Technology Private Limited.
